Decklist.DesignGoal: Legacy: Combine The Rack and Discard

Card.Name: Vicious Conquistador
Card.RulesText: Whenever Vicious Conquistador attacks, each opponent loses 1 life.

Card.Name: Fume Spitter
Card.RulesText: Sacrifice Fume Spitter: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

Card.Name: Deadeye Tracker
Card.RulesText: {1}{B}, {T}: Exile two target cards from an opponent's graveyard. Deadeye Tracker explores.

Card.Name: Black Knight
Card.RulesText: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Protection from white (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything white.)

Card.Name: Ruin Raider
Card.RulesText: Raid — At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked this turn, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to the card's mana value.

Card.Name: Phyrexian Rager
Card.RulesText: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

Card.Name: Hypnotic Specter
Card.RulesText: Flying Whenever Hypnotic Specter deals damage to an opponent, that player discards a card at random.

Card.Name: Dread Shade
Card.RulesText: {B}: Dread Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Card.Name: Gurmag Angler
Card.RulesText: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)

Card.Name: Dark Ritual
Card.RulesText: Add {B}{B}{B}.

Card.Name: Duress
Card.RulesText: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

Card.Name: Funeral Charm
Card.RulesText: Choose one — • Target player discards a card. • Target creature gets +2/-1 until end of turn. • Target creature gains swampwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

Card.Name: The Rack
Card.RulesText: As The Rack enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. At the beginning of the chosen player's upkeep, The Rack deals X damage to that player, where X is 3 minus the number of cards in their hand.

Card.Name: Hymn to tourach
Card.RulesText: Target player discards two cards at random.

Card.Name: Diabolic Edict
Card.RulesText: Target player sacrifices a creature.

Card.Name: Terror
Card.RulesText: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

Card.Name: Doom Blade
Card.RulesText: Destroy target nonblack creature.

Card.Name: Drain Life
Card.RulesText: Spend only black mana on X. Drain Life deals X damage to any target. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more life than the player's life total before the damage was dealt, the planeswalker's loyalty before the damage was dealt, or the creature's toughness.

Card.Name: Bitterblossom
Card.RulesText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.

Card.Name: Ashes to Ashes
Card.RulesText: Exile two target nonartifact creatures. Ashes to Ashes deals 5 damage to you.

Card.Name: Phyrexian Arena
Card.RulesText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

Card.Name: No Mercy
Card.RulesText: Whenever a creature deals damage to you, destroy it.
